description: West Brom manager Tony Pulis confirms Swansea City's interest in Baggies' winger Nacer Chadli.
title: Nacer Chadli: Tony Pulis confirms Swansea City interest in West Brom winger
title_page: Nacer Chadli: Tony Pulis confirms Swansea City interest in West Brom winger - BBC Sport
maintext:
West Brom manager Tony Pulis has confirmed Swansea City's interest in Baggies' winger Nacer Chadli.
It is understood Chadli, 28, has been a target for the Swans even before he joined Tottenham from Twente in 2013.
The Welsh club tried to sign him before his move from Spurs to West Brom last year, and Chadli's future at the Hawthorns is in doubt after his argument with Pulis.
"What was said was said and you move on," said Pulis.
"That's the way I've always been in life.
